      public static java.lang.String bitString​(boolean value)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The string "1" is the boolean is true and "0" if the boolean is false.

    • tickDiff

      public static long tickDiff​(long olderTick, long tick)
      Returns the microsecond difference between two ticks. This function handles rollover of ticks as ticks are only 32bit. ... print(pigpio.tickDiff(4294967272, 12)) 36 ...
      Parameters:
      olderTick - tick 1
      tick - tick 2
      Returns:
      difference between ticks
